description.@en: Placing your hands out in contrition, you begin to speak with the spirit of the recently deceased.

criticalFailure.@en: Haunted voices can be heard all around! The spirit board instantly splinters, ruined forever. Everyone participating in the séance is immediately subjected to Fear.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but triple the number of questions you can ask.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you can speak with a Restless Spirit where they haunt, before their grave or in the presence of a blood relative of the deceased individual. You can only ask a number of questions equal to your [WB]. The spirit can only answer yes/no questions, with either a ‘yes’ (indicated by one audible knocking sound) or a ‘no’ (indicating by two audible knocking sounds) given in answer. They will always answer truthfully.

reagents.@en: A spirit board, two people and the True Name of the Restless Spirit you wish to speak with
